tutorial.speak:
Let's learn how to arrange lesson items to play in your preferred order.
First, register or login to your Lessons.Church account.
Inside your schedules, click on the person with a gear on their shoulder icon.
Use the Up, Down, and Trashcan icons to set the items inside the schedule the way you want them to be arranged.
Everything auto-saves and will be distributed to the apps exactly as you set it up.
